name: Robo Reroll Rumble
description:
Help Dee-20 to get the dice generator under control!

The robot factory is malfunctioning! The dice component has stopped working and the machine is throwing out random items now. You and your magnet need to find a way to satisfy your customers before you go bankrupt!

Made by:

- ExoSkull (https://twitter.com/ExoSkull3)
- LPadest
- Lira (https://twitter.com/TransDragonLira)
- sunnexo (https://sunnexo.moe/)

Made for the GMTK GameJam 2022
